b1d8e552-1bcf-49cc-a24b-9ac6368d42a8.description: The Living Online GS5 examination covers skills for working in an Internet or networked environment and for maximizing your communication, education, collaboration, and social interaction in a safe and ethical way.
b1d8e552-1bcf-49cc-a24b-9ac6368d42a8.name: Living Online

badge_template_activities.title: Identify network fundamentals and the benefits and risks of network computing
Identify different types of electronic communication/collaboration and how they work
Identity information about the Internet, the World Wide Web and Web sites and be able to use a Web browsing application
Understand how content is created, located and evaluated on the World Wide Web
Identify how computers are used in different areas of work, school and home
Identify the risks of using computer hardware and software and how to use computers and the Internet safely, ethically and legally

a0e5406b-fd0e-417f-acd9-267b0300514f.description: The Computing Fundamentals GS5 examination covers a foundational understanding of computer hardware, software, operating systems, peripherals, and troubleshooting. It is designed to help you maximize the value and benefits of using computer technology.
a0e5406b-fd0e-417f-acd9-267b0300514f.name: Computing Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Identify types of computers, how they process information, and the purpose and function of different hardware components
Identify how to maintain computer equipment and solve common problems relating to computer hardware
Identify how software and hardware work together to perform computing tasks and how software is distributed and upgraded
Identify different types of application software and general concepts relating to application software categories
Identify what an operating system is and how it works, and solve common problems related to operating systems
Use an operating system to manipulate a computer’s desktop, files and disks, change system settings, and install and remove software.

68802468-8a83-4b85-b368-810995fcca97.description: The Key Applications GS5 examination covers the most common features of popular word processing, spreadsheet, database, and presentation applications. It is designed to help you become more efficient in environments requiring the use of these applications.
68802468-8a83-4b85-b368-810995fcca97.name: Key Applications

badge_template_activities.title: Be able to start and exit an application, identify and modify interface elements and utilize sources of online help
Perform common file-management, editing, and formatting functions
Be able to format text and documents including the ability to use automatic formatting tools
Be able to use word-processing tools to automate processes such as document review, security and collaboration
Be able to sort, manipulate, and modify worksheet data using formulas and functions, and create simple charts
Be able to create and format simple presentations

ccf8a2c4-0675-4fcd-84db-7714609b9e24.description: The IC3 Digital Literacy GS5 Certification provides the global standard for validating online knowledge, computing fundamentals, and application proficiency through true performance-based testing.

20d010d5-ffb8-4a28-8e04-cc9430c2f57f.description: Successful completion of the Entrepreneurship and Small Business Certification (ESB) validates skills and knowledge for those students interested in working in a middle-skill trade profession as their own boss and those with entrepreneurship and small business career aspirations. These core concepts include entrepreneurship; recognizing and evaluating opportunities; planning for, starting, and operating a business; marketing and sales; and financial management.

c6f59fa8-8309-41f1-87b9-846642c026d4.description: The Entrepreneurship & Small Business certification is built to test and validate foundation-level concepts and knowledge in entrepreneurship and small business management. These core concepts include entrepreneurship; recognizing and evaluating opportunities; planning for, starting, and operating a business; marketing and sales; venture capital and seed funding; and financial management. Exam Minimum Passing Score is 700 out of 1000

badge_template_activities.title: The skills measured include entrepreneurial and small business concepts; marketing and sales; production and distribution; business financials.

badge_template_activities.title: Pre-requisite: Autodesk Certified Instructor - Silver. Annual requirements: Attend a minimum of product/workflow training hours. Teach Product training annual minimums with courses registered in Autodesk Training Evaluation System. Submit an article or featured contribution to a published journal, the Autodesk Knowledge Network (AKN), or deliver or publish a presentation at a professional/education conference or AU. Attend minimum hours of professional instructional development.
Maintenance is for a six year period, and requires the following annually:
Attend a minimum hours of product/workflow training
Teach Product training annual minimums with courses registered in Autodesk Training and Evaluation System
Submit an article or featured contribution to a published journal, the Autodesk Knowledge Network (AKN) and/or deliver and/or publish a presentation at a professional/education conference
Attend minimum hours of professional development (instructional delivery, instructional design, curriculum development, project management, etc.) related to the core area of expertise

The relevant workflows and skills are highly in demand and can be applied in various applications at civil engineering firms. © 2021 Autodesk, Inc. All rights reserved.
807f27a5-53a7-4018-9f3e-93f25e98af74.name: Autodesk Certified Professional in Civil 3D for Infrastructure Design

issuer.summary: issued by Certiport and authorized by Autodesk

d6716333-aabe-44cc-aa92-f189aa752a59.description: Successfully earning the Design for Manufacturing Professional Certification demonstrates skills in designing for subtractive manufacturing, additive manufacturing, injection molding and casting, and sheet metal manufacturing using Autodesk Fusion 360. These Autodesk Certified Professionals have proven CAD skills that are relevant to emerging roles and workflows in manufacturing. © 2021 Autodesk, Inc. All rights reserved.
d6716333-aabe-44cc-aa92-f189aa752a59.name: Autodesk Certified Professional in Design for Manufacturing

59edcd5f-2739-4302-b6d5-0a354cc8291b.description: Successfully earning the Inventor for Mechanical Design Professional Certification demonstrates advanced skills using Autodesk Inventor, including relevant workflows, processes, and project objectives. These Autodesk Certified Professionals are competent in skills such as advanced part modeling, assembly modeling, sheet metal, weldments, and technical drawing for manufacturing. © 2021 Autodesk, Inc. All rights reserved.

The relevant workflows and skills are highly in demand and can be applied in various design and engineering applications at architectural or building engineering firms. © 2021 Autodesk, Inc. 7441d42f-6743-4aac-8a9b-8f5e3a29fa9c.description: The Autodesk Certified User (ACU) World Championship is a virtual competition where students from around the globe, ages 13-22, who have earned an ACU certification compete and demonstrate their abilities using Autodesk AutoCAD, Inventor, Revit Architecture, Maya, and/or 3ds Max. Competitors use Autodesk software to create a design project in one of three categories: Architecture, Manufacturing, or Digital Story Telling.
7441d42f-6743-4aac-8a9b-8f5e3a29fa9c.name: Autodesk Certified User World Championship (ACU)

badge_template_activities.title: Take and pass an Autodesk Certified User certification exam
Create and enter a project in the ACU World Championship
Be selected as a winner by educational leaders and Autodesk experts

ea69be94-bcf6-4687-95bd-e766079ab116.description: Autodesk created an internal program (Sustainability G.O.A.L Program) to equip employees with tools and strategies to partner with customers in achieving their sustainability goals. There are 4 levels: Guest / Official / Ambassador / Leader. After earning the Ambassador status, the employee will be able to demonstrate an advanced understanding of Autodesk Impact Strategy, Sustainability Solutions/workflows and to have impactful conversations with customers.
ea69be94-bcf6-4687-95bd-e766079ab116.name: Autodesk Sustainability Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by Certiport and authorized by Autodesk

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a sustainability online course and/or read the latest Autodesk Impact Report
Lead a sustainability onboarding session for new hires, or introduce your team to Sustainability at Autodesk.
Pass a win with sustainability exam with a score higher than 84%.
Create a portfolio of six customers and get familiar with their sustainability goals.
Demonstrate familiarity with Autodesk sustainability content ( customer stories, programs, impact report,...)

4489339d-2290-49c9-af45-895782637a4b.description: Autodesk created an internal program (Sustainability G.O.A.L Program) to equip employees with tools and strategies to partner with customers in achieving their sustainability goals. There are 4 levels: Guest / Official / Ambassador / Leader. To earn the Leader status, the employee needs to earn the Ambassador status and lead 3 projects with a focus on sustainability.
4489339d-2290-49c9-af45-895782637a4b.name: Autodesk Sustainability Leader

issuer.summary: issued by Certiport and authorized by Autodesk

badge_template_activities.title: Lead as a project manager three sustainability initiatives.
Autodesk Sustainability Ambassador

96c9155f-2855-4dc1-9c22-305429569b90.description: The Communication Skills for Business (CSB) Professional Communication certification validates that candidates entering the workforce understand key communication principles and possess the skills that are necessary to be effective in a work environment. While the key skill measured in the exam is communication, the nature of the exam will also help candidates with the other 3 of ‘the 4 Cs”: Critical Thinking, Collaboration and Creativity. Exam Minimum Passing Score is 700 out of 1000
96c9155f-2855-4dc1-9c22-305429569b90.name: Communication Skills for Business: Professional Communication (v.1)

badge_template_activities.title: The skills measured include describe basic communication principles; plan for effective communication; apply best practices for creating business deliverables; deliver your message; receive communications; analyze communication scenarios.

673f0ac2-eb9b-4933-bdf5-a8ac4faf448b.description: IC3 Digital Literacy allows candidates to demonstrate their ability to select and use the appropriate research, productivity, collaboration, and communications tools, to find reliable information, create content, communicate safely, and identify credibility and bias in modern digital environments. The new exam structure is a comprehensive set of stackable certifications across seven digital literacy domains.
673f0ac2-eb9b-4933-bdf5-a8ac4faf448b.name: IC3 Digital Literacy GS6 - Level 1, Level 2, & Level 3 (v.1)

badge_template_activities.title: The skills measured include technology basics; digital citizenship; information management; content creation; communication; collaboration; safety and security.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

61ce3c98-6bda-4c96-9420-3dd5727dd4f8.description: The Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship is an invitation-only event where students compete and demonstrate their Microsoft Excel abilities. Competitors can improve workplace productivity by creating and formatting worksheets; customizing worksheet options and views; inserting, ordering, and formatting cell data; creating, modifying, and filtering tables; analyzing data using functions, including conditional logic; and inserting and formatting Building Blocks, charts, and objects.
61ce3c98-6bda-4c96-9420-3dd5727dd4f8.name: Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship - Excel 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Take and pass a Microsoft Office Specialist certification exam
Compete in and win the National MOS Championship
Compete in the MOS World Championship
Successfully recreate a complex Excel spreadsheet from scratch within 50 minutes or less

6d8345ec-607a-4525-ac1a-dbd0aa21d6d6.description: The Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship is an invitation-only event where students compete and demonstrate their Microsoft PowerPoint abilities. Competitors can improve workplace productivity by creating, customizing, and formatting presentations; leveraging slide master templates; formatting text, tables, charts, SmartArt, images, and media; applying and timing slide transitions and animations; merging content from multiple presentations; and protecting and sharing presentations.
6d8345ec-607a-4525-ac1a-dbd0aa21d6d6.name: Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship - PowerPoint 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Take and pass a Microsoft Office Specialist certification exam
Compete and win in a National MOS Championship
Compete in the MOS World Championship
Successfully recreate a complex PowerPoint presentation from scratch within 50 minutes or less

b3d31773-f518-46fc-bdec-56624c81da40.description: The Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship is an invitation-only event where students compete and demonstrate their Microsoft Word abilities. Competitors can improve workplace productivity through creating, navigating, and formatting documents; customizing document options and views; formatting text and paragraphs; creating and modifying tables and lists; creating endnotes, footnotes, citations, and captions; and inserting and formatting Building Blocks, shapes, SmartArt, and images.
b3d31773-f518-46fc-bdec-56624c81da40.name: Microsoft Office Specialist World Championship - Word 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Take and pass a Microsoft Office Specialist certification exam
Compete and win in a National MOS Championship
Compete in the MOS World Championship
Successfully recreate a complex Word document from scratch within 50 minutes or less
